sub_title: System Architect EBS Cloud & Support, EBS Automation at Aegon
summary: Experienced, TOGAF Certified, IT Enterprise/Solution Architect with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry. Skilled in Google Cloud, Cloud integrations, Scrum, SQL, Oracle Database, SOAP, XML, REST, API Management, Solution and Enterprise Architecture. Strong consulting professional with a Master of Science (M.Sc.) focused in Information Technology from University of Sarajevo, Faculty of Electrotechnical Engineering.

projects.title: Merger of BSS/OSS stacks of UPC RO and Vodafone in order to offer a new DTV service to Vodafone Romania customers
projects.description:
Situation:
During a merger of UPC Romania (former part of Liberty Global) and Vodafone in Romania an integration of BSS/OSS stack and network components on AWS cloud was required in order to offer a new DTV service (content provided from AWS cloud infrastructure) for UPC Romania customers (now part of Vodafone Romania)
Tasks:
As a Lead Solution Architect define a concept of integration between existing BSS/OSS stack of UPC Romania, which also included some central Liberty global components, ensuring that all relevant security and agreed business principles (Liberty Global becomes a service provider for Vodafone Romania) are followed
Define a platform and a future integration principles as part of partner management service from Liberty global side
Perform impact assessment of this integration project and communicate the results to high level management stakeholders and other business stakeholders
Create high level solution architecture and present it to both Liberty Global and Vodafone Group stakeholders
Review LLDs and Testing scenarios to assure compliance to solution and requirements
Provide guidance and support of project delivery in all project phases
Actions:
Provided necessary design documents and supporting decks related to BSS/OSS and network integration
Defined networking principles for integration of on premise BSS components with Vodafone components on AWS cloud infrastructure
Defined solution and principles behind API Management platform utilization in order to adhere to security requirements and general principles
Provided guidance and insights for both management and delivery teams at the same time working closely with Project Managers dedicated to the project
Assured compliance of delivery to the designed solution

contributors.headline: System Architect EBS Cloud & Support, EBS Automation at Aegon

projects.title: Ericsson/ConceptWave Order Management/Catalogue Management implementation in BH Telecom
projects.description:
As a project leader from BH Telecom side I coordinated other teams involved in a project responsible for integration, provisioning on network elements, data migration, business process execution and report development.
Besides leading the project I designed the integration architecture and even developed 90% percent of needed flows for integration of this new system with all other systems involved (billing, rating, two activation platforms, technical repository, CRM)

contributors.headline: System Architect EBS Cloud & Support, EBS Automation at Aegon

projects.title: UOM-Unified Sales Ordering Management implemented for BH Telecom company
projects.description:
I was the member of the SOA Integration team. I lead the development and implementation of the Integration solutions (architectures, processes, messaging, global system Error Handling.) in a strategic Business integration project for the biggest Telecom Company in Bosnia & Herzegovina. 
In order to better understand the project scope and project tasks, the global enterprise application system consisted of the following big application components:
•	CCM-Common Customer Master/Unique Customer repository for all Telecom BSS (Mobile telephony and other mobile related services, Fixed lines Telephony, Internet/web services, Data traffic services, IPTV+VOIP+Internet+Mobile Bundled services, hybrid Fixed+Mobile Subscription grouping services)
o	Certainly  this application module includes the history of products/services activation and deactivation for every particular customer and/or subscription

•	UOM-Unified Sales Ordering Management – The system consists of two components:
o	Unified Ordering Management
o	Unified Product catalogue (Inventory management module)
•	Business Processes Integration/Midleware Layer – We developed and implemented Business processes/flows as BPEL/ESB flows which support and integrate all of the Business products and/or services. Shortly, the Integration layer link the Sales Ordering Management system with Provisioning, Rating, technical inventory and Billing systems. This mentioned Integration layer/middleware we implemented on Oracle SOA Suite 10g. (It is important to emphasize on this place that I also have significant experience with design and development on Oracle SOA Suite 11g on Oracle WebLogic Application Server 11g)

The crown for the overall project was the implementation of the Bundled/Packed  services – what consists of the following technologies:
•	IPTV
•	VOIP
•	Internet
•	Mobile subscription

contributors.headline: System Architect EBS Cloud & Support, EBS Automation at Aegon
Head of Technology and Architecture Department
Software Development Consultant at Paysafe on behalf of Endava

projects.title: Netflix and other 3rd party content providers integration and introduction into Virgin Media UK portfolio
projects.description:
Situation:
Liberty Global was interested to integrate with Netflix APIs and Apps in order to provide Netflix content as a part of Liberty Global offering. Full billing and charging of Netflix subscription needs to be done on Liberty Global side. Similar concept should be applicable to any 3rd party content provider integration with Liberty Global. First affiliate to implement this was Virgin Media in UK
Tasks:
As an Enterprise Architect define a strategic concept of integration with 3rd Party Content providers
Define a platform and processes for 3rd party integration which will be implemented during Netflix integration project
Perform impact assessment of the Netflix integration project and communicate the results to high level management stakeholders and other business stakeholders
Create high level solution architecture of the Netflix integration solution
Review LLDs and Testing scenarios to assure compliance to solution and requirements
Provide guidance and support of project delivery in all project phases
Actions:
Provided necessary design documents and supporting decks related to Netflix integration and overall concept of 3rd party content provider integration
Provided guidance and insights for both management and delivery teams at the same time working closely with Project Managers dedicated to the project
Assured compliance of delivery to the designed solution
Results:
After this project execution Liberty Global had a defined concept of future integration with 3rd party content providers and has been able to successfully integrate with Netflix in Virgin Media. Netflix charging and invoicing is now part of Virgin Media invoice which gives customers greater flexibility in regards to payment methods. Also customers are able to track Netflix charges more easily and consistently.

contributors.headline: System Architect EBS Cloud & Support, EBS Automation at Aegon

projects.title: Akana API Management Platform implementation at Liberty Global
projects.description:
Situation:
Liberty Global was interested to implement an API Management platform on the group level and chose Akana as a preferred solution for both internal and external communication
Tasks:
Define High Availability concept and design necessary platform that supports it
Define non-functional requirements testing process and metrics for performance testing
Test executions management and reporting
Actions:
Provided necessary design documents and supporting decks related to high availability and non-functional requirements
Provided necessary documentation and overviews of testing process
Led the key tests execution related to high availability requirements
Results:
After a 6 month implementation project Akana API Management platform was introduced in Liberty Global for all affiliates with a high availability stack in place

contributors.headline: System Architect EBS Cloud & Support, EBS Automation at Aegon

projects.title: Salesforce CRM and billing implementation for B2B customers at Unitymedia Germany
projects.description:
Situation:
Unitymedia in Germany was replacing existing CRM and billing solutions for B2B customers. A decision has been made to move to cloud AWS infrastructure for billing and a Salesforce CRM implementation. It was required to integrate both components in order to support ordering and billing processes E2E.
Tasks:
Execute impact assessment and create related to documents that explain the impact and effort required to execute entire project
High Level Management key stakeholders negotiation around strategy alignment and project execution
Define High Level Solution Architecture
Overview Low Level Design Process and Test Scenarios creation
Delivery and Testing support and guidance
Actions:
Provided necessary design documents and supporting decks related to the overall solution both for Salesforce implementation and required functionality as well as billing component implementation
Provided design documents that explain AWS cloud infrastructure in use and define high level security and network design required to support billing in private AWS cloud
Provided high level solution architecture for integration of Salesforce and Billing components
Provided guidance and insights for both management and delivery teams working closely with Project Managers dedicated to the project
Done review of all LLDs and Testing plans for multiple environments (Dev, System Integration, Pre-Production, Production)
Provided architecture related support and solution overview during all phases of the project up to Production Go-Live
Results:
After a 9 month implementation project Unitymedia replaced existing legacy components for B2B customers with state of the art solutions based on the latest technological platforms. This allowed for less complex process for CSR agents and more focus on the end customer negotiation and management. Due to this implementation Unitymedia saw a rise in the number of B2B customers in the following months.

contributors.headline: System Architect EBS Cloud & Support, EBS Automation at Aegon

profile_positions.title: System Architect EBS Cloud & Support, EBS Automation

profile_positions.description:
Technology for people
Transformation has been in our DNA from day one, it’s not simply hype that we have
decided to surf opportunistically. We use this ability to help our customers win their
digital battle.
Technology will continue to transform the way we work and live and it will continue to
raise many questions about both opportunities and challenges.
At Devoteam we truly believe that these innovations are a force for positive change.
Change allows us to bring great benefits to businesses and people.
Over the last 20 years we have helped our clients benefit from technological
opportunities to transform their assets & activities:
Interconnecting networks, data centres & now the cloud to build global IT
infrastructures.
Turning cost-driven IT departments into agile, service-oriented enablers serving business
needs.
Rethinking processes to optimize operational efficiency while at the same time building
great user experiences for consumers & employees.
Now, it is all about Digital Transformation. And as always, we put People at the heart of
what we do.
